t: Perfect Diary’s Yatsen to Buy Eve Lom From Manzanita Capital
s: March 3, 2021 - LONDON — Yatsen Holding Ltd., the parent company of cosmetics and skin care brands Perfect Diary, Little Ondine, Abby’s Choice and Galénic, Tuesday announced that it will acquire skincare brand Eve Lom from Manzanita Capital.

t: Chinese beauty company Yatsen acquires iconic skincare brand GALENIC from French group Pierre Fabre
s: Guangzhou (China), Castres (France); October 30, 2020 - Chinese beauty company Yatsen has acquired GALENIC, an iconic skincare brand, after reaching an acquisition agreement with French pharmaceutical and dermo-cosmetic group Pierre Fabre. The take-over will be effective on November 1st, 2020.

t: C-Beauty Unicorn Yatsen Q1 Sales Jump 47%
s: May 20, 2021 - LONDON — Yatsen Holding Limited, the owner of Tmall’s best-selling cosmetics brand Perfect Diary, saw its gross sales for the first quarter ended March 31 jump 47 percent year-over-year to 1.69 billion renminbi, or $257.3 million.
